backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing three loginâ€‘modal-related features and the frontend files they affect.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and loading the Vite main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps TimerScreen in a ThemeProvider to enable system/dark theme switching.
frontend/src/components/EventSelector.ts: Dropdown component for selecting a WCA event, using shadcn-ui Select.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Reusable Internet Identity login modal that triggers login on button click and auto-closes on successful authentication.
frontend/src/components/ScramblePanel.ts: Displays current scramble with a refresh button and generation status.
frontend/src/components/ScrambleVisualiz: Loads and renders 2D puzzle visualization via TwistyPlayer from CDN with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/SessionStats.tsx: Displays computed session stats (current, best, ao5, ao12, mo3) in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/SolveHistory.tsx: Scrollable grid showing recent solve results with DNF highlighting and solve numbering.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: Displays formatted timer or inspection time with state-based colors and text, handling pointer events and final result formatting.
frontend/src/components/TimerScreen.tsx: Main timer screen managing events, scrambles, solves, authentication prompts, and session persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and persistence of identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaScramble.ts: Generates and manages WCA scrambles using cubing.js with async loading and regeneration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useWcaTimerControls.t: Controls timer and inspection states, tracking timing, warnings, and final results with animation frame updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color themes for timer UI, including light/dark mode and timer-specific colors.
frontend/src/lib/inspectionAudio.ts: Implements Web Audio API beeps for inspection warnings with lazy initialization and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/sessionCookie.ts: Handles saving and loading session data to a browser cookie, including JSON encoding and basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStats.ts: Computes session statistics like current time, best time, ao5, ao12, and mo3 using solve history.
frontend/src/lib/wcaEvents.ts: Defines the list of supported WCA events with IDs, names, and scramble identifiers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/types/cubing.d.ts: Provides TypeScript declarations for cubing.net scramble and twisty modules.
frontend/src/types/solves.ts: Defines solve entry types and helpers for formatting or extracting solve times.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, plugins, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, requirements, and pending authentication-related feature requests.
